channel.title: CVE Feed for SolarWinds -- Server & Application Monitor (SAM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SolarWinds -- Server & Application Monitor (SAM)

item.title: CVE-2022-47508|2024-08-03T14:55:08.308Z -- solarwinds -- server%20%26%20application%20monitor%20%28sam%29
item.description: Customers who had configured their polling to occur via Kerberos did not expect NTLM Traffic on their environment, but since we were querying for data via IP address this prevented us from utilizing Kerberos.
